pkgmetadata.longdescription: # async_case[![PyPi Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/async_case.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/async_case/)Backport of Python 3.8's unittest.IsolatedAsyncioTestCaseSee upstream [docs](https://docs.python.org/3/library/unittest.html#unittest.IsolatedAsyncioTestCase)and [source](https://github.com/python/cpython/blob/3.8/Lib/unittest/async_case.py) for more.```pip install async_case```
